Portable Laser Guitar




Ever imagined playing a guitar with a “laser” string? You’ve just got yourself a chance! With laser beams replacing ordinary strings, an electronic sounding system replacing the big dumb body, we made playing the guitar the coolest thing you could ever imagine!
